properties.areaDesc: Manitou Island to Point Isabelle MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 8 at 4:48AM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and waves 3 to 6 feet occurring. For
the Gale Watch, south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt
and waves 8 to 13 feet possible.

* WHERE...Manitou Island to Point Isabelle MI.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 11 AM EST this
morning. For the Gale Watch, from late tonight through
Thursday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
